name: Eran Almog
description: Eran Almog, an indica-dominant strain developed by Tikun Olam, is a high THC strain used for treating sleep disorders and nausea. Popular among patients in Israel, Eran Almog also effectively fights inflammation, pain, and indigestion. This variety, named after a Tikun Olam patient, has a THC content that reaches up to 28 percent.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Stress, Insomnia, Pain, Inflammation, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
